steps.description: Automated telemetry or operator report triggers an alert for a fault on equipment (e.g., SIMATIC PLC, SINAMICS drive). Alert is ingested by Siemens remote monitoring platform and a ticket is created.
steps.businessRationale: Fast detection (minutes) is required to minimize production downtime; quicker detection increases chance of remote remediation and reduces costly onsite interventions.

steps.description: Remote engineer connects to the device via secure gateway, collects logs, runs diagnostics, and attempts remote remediation or identifies required spare parts (e.g., PLC CPU module replacement).
steps.businessRationale: Remote diagnostics typically take under an hour for initial triage; successful remote fix avoids expensive onsite dispatch and preserves revenue by reducing downtime penalties.

steps.description: If remote diagnostics identify a failed component, parts are reserved in inventory, a parts order is created, and shipment is scheduled to the customer site (SKU examples: SIMATIC S7-1500 CPU module, SINAMICS power module).
steps.businessRationale: Parts procurement and transit for industrial components commonly span multiple days; accurate ETA tracking is critical to minimize production loss and contractual penalties.

steps.description: Field service schedules technician visit, confirms access windows with customer, and allocates required tools and replacement parts to the technician's job.
steps.businessRationale: Coordinating field resources and customer availability typically requires hours; efficient scheduling reduces travel costs and shortens mean time to repair (MTTR).

steps.description: Technician performs onsite replacement/repair (e.g., swap SIMATIC CPU, replace SINAMICS module), reconfigures PLC/HMI, runs functional tests and returns system to production state.
steps.businessRationale: Onsite repair and commissioning for industrial components often require several hours; successful first-time fix reduces follow-up visits and increases customer satisfaction and contract renewal likelihood.

steps.description: Record acceptance test results, update CMMS/ERP, generate invoice for parts and labor, and schedule follow-up preventive maintenance or training if required.
steps.businessRationale: Timely validation and billing close the revenue loop and enable SLA reporting; delays in invoicing or documentation can delay revenue recognition and reduce cash flow.
